channel.title: News on Historical Income Panel for the Netherlands
channel.description: Recent content in News on Historical Income Panel for the Netherlands

item.title: Presentations in 2023/2024
item.description: Some recent presentations by the HIP-NL project: 2024 EHS annual conference SSHA 2023 EHES 2023 A slidedeck presenting the state of the project and inequality trends in the Netherlands can be found here

item.title: HIP-NL at the 2023 Posthumus conference
item.description: Eva will present about the HIP-NL project at the Posthumus Conference. We’re in the session on Fiscal sources for the study of inequality on Wednesday the 24th, 1500.
